title: Base by Monsees
description: A modern, responsive website for a new streetfood bar located at Biersteeg 10, Hilversum. Features an interactive menu system, online reservation functionality, and seamless user experience. Built with React and TypeScript, showcasing modern web development practices.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: The website you're currently viewing! A sophisticated, animated portfolio showcasing modern web development skills. Features custom ASCII art animations, smooth page transitions, and a fully responsive design built with React, Vite, and TypeScript.
